posts.post_content:
I am looking to pick up a well-centered example of Hank Perry from the T212 Obak set.  Please PM me with scans of both the front and back of this card.

The $80 or so asking price on eBay for a VG3 seems right to me.  I missed the last sale there and would like to acquire this card for roughly the same price.

Best,

Eric
